unnormalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to IIT Dreams!
normalised: Edu-Tech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to I I T Dreams!

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch after those JEE coaching fees? Fear not, future engineers and doctors! Scholarship portals are becoming the go-to for Indian students hunting for financial aid. Sites like Vidya Lakshmi and Buddy4Study are packed with opportunities.
normalised: Feeling the pinch after those J E E coaching fees? Fear not, future engineers and doctors! Scholarship portals are becoming the go-to for Indian students hunting for financial aid. Sites like Vidya Lakshmi and Buddy four Study are packed with opportunities.

unnormalised: Imagine, from humble beginnings in Patna to cracking IIT Delhi with a full ride – scholarship portals make it possible. They list everything from government schemes like the Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students to smaller, privately funded programs. Think scholarships for girls pursuing STEM, or even merit-based awards for excelling in kabaddi!
normalised: Imagine, from humble beginnings in Patna to cracking I I T Delhi with a full ride – scholarship portals make it possible. They list everything from government schemes like the Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students to smaller, privately funded programs. Think scholarships for girls pursuing S T E M, or even merit-based awards for excelling in kabaddi!

unnormalised: Many offer personalized recommendations based on your profile. Just sign up, fill in your details, and BAM! Opportunities galore. Deadlines are crucial though, many applications close on 30/09/2024, and some at 17:00 hrs sharp!
normalised: Many offer personalized recommendations based on your profile. Just sign up, fill in your details, and B A M! Opportunities galore. Deadlines are crucial though, many applications close on thirtieth september two thousand and twenty four, and some at five post meridian sharp!

unnormalised: Don't wait till Diwali celebrations distract you; start browsing NOW! Keep an eye out for portals associated with big names like Tata Trusts too. Some even offer Rs. 50,000 - Rs. 2,00,000 per year! Remember to check eligibility criteria, gather your documents by 10/08/2024 and good luck!
normalised: Don't wait till Diwali celebrations distract you; start browsing N O W! Keep an eye out for portals associated with big names like Tata Trusts too. Some even offer rupee fifty thousand - rupee two lakh per year! Remember to check eligibility criteria, gather your documents by tenth august two thousand and twenty four and good luck!
